mapper.select:
SELECT s.id, s.NAME, s.mobile, s.oms_code, s.create_time, s.update_time, s.source, s.sub_channel, s.page_url, s.cli_type, s.from_openid, s.from_union_id, s.scene, d.label type, m.`mall_name` FROM tb_wap_sign_up s LEFT JOIN tb_report_act_dict d ON s.type = d.value LEFT JOIN tb_wap_mall m on s.oms_code = m.oms_code
${ew.sqlSegment}
